# Pull Request

## Description

Please include a summary of the changes and the related issue. Please also include relevant motivation and context.

Fixes # (issue)

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] This change requires a documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)

## Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested this change manually

### Test Coverage
<!-- If applicable, please add information about test coverage -->

## Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have run linting and formatting tools

### Linting Results
<!-- Please confirm that linting passes -->

```bash
npm run lint    # Should pass with no errors
npm run typecheck # Should pass with no errors
npm test        # All tests should pass
```

## Documentation

- [ ] I have updated documentation related to this change
- [ ] No documentation changes are needed

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the zero-dependency principle (no external packages)
- [ ] My changes are backwards compatible
- [ ] I have read and followed the contribution guidelines
- [ ] I have provided a clear description of what this PR does
- [ ] I have added tests to cover my changes
- [ ] I have verified that all tests pass locally
- [ ] I have ensured TypeScript strict mode compatibility

## Additional Context

Add any other context or screenshots about the pull request here.

## Breaking Changes

If this PR contains breaking changes, please describe them here and how users should migrate.

---

## Reviewer Guidelines

When reviewing this PR, please check:
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Zero-dependency principle is maintained
- [ ] TypeScript strict mode compliance
- [ ] Test coverage is adequate
- [ ] Documentation is updated (if applicable)
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
